idea:
Dadobaa Oils (OPC) Private Limited is a company manufacturing vegetable Oils by Traditional Method of Wood Press.

Dadobaa Wood Cold Pressed oils are prepared using traditional wooden ghani with a slight modern touch to it.The process of extraction is slow i.e. the temperature of the oils do not exceed 50 degree celsius (80 degree celsius in the expeller). We do not add any preservatives,the natural shelf life of the oils is present. We make oils which are free of harsh chemicals and the alteration of the natural oil properties is nill.


Vision

Our vision is to make India self- sufficient again in oil production and to provide healthy cooking oils for all the members of our nation.


Mission

Our mission is to be an ambassador of purity in edible cooking oils.
name: DADOBAA OILS (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: SHIVKUNJ CONSTRUCTION PRIVATE LIMITED  is one of the fastest growing construction companies of India, focusing on infrastructure construction segment including highways, buildings and railways. We have has a unique business model, with proven expertise in innovative thinking, project and cost management. We are focused on delivering high quality work within budgeted time and costs, as evident in the various accolades and repeat business. We have also developed an appropriate blend of entrepreneurs and hands on professionals, constantly thinking & executing innovative and cost effective solutions to clients' requirements.
name: SHIVKUNJ CONSTRUCTION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

idea:

and sports centric platform where learning sports and

idea: Bakkbenchers Innovative Media is a new-age digital media entertainment company with a strong focus on mobile video that leverages data analytics and technology to create and distribute highly engaging short, original, premium, personal and relatable vernacular video content for the smartphone Indian generation, on their social media platforms.

idea: We are 100% Food focused, Consulting and Technology-agnostic solution providers. In partnership with our customers, we are transforming the way food is processed  by providing consulting and tailor made software solution & services. Our IT enabled solutions  include business applications & regulatory compliance applications ( FSSAI ,Food safety, Food quality, Labelling, Audits etc.).
name: Unnicoral Technologiess LLP

idea: Creating an e-commerce global platform for high quality bed sheets, quilts and other ancillary products through technology enabled processes thus enabling this unorganized sector to grow.

idea: We are becoming India's no 1 shoes brand in next 5 years.

idea: Fan Engagement Platform for Bollywood Fans. We rewards Bollywood fans for their fandom.

idea:
We are Accelsus Services, a vibrant young organization working towards becoming a key player in the Information Technology Service Management (ITSM).

We help our customers capitalize on the tools of the digital age by providing leadership and daily operational support of our clients' business and network-related systems.

Our mission is to provide efficient pro-active network administration, service and support to small and medium businesses. We strive to be the IT solutions partner of choice for these organizations and to help them reach their business goals through the intelligent use and management of computer and network technology.
name: Accelsus Services
